SettingANewHubInstructions: Tap the place marker button. A new potential marker will appear at your location and the voting tab will be opened. Place your first vote to finalize your new hub!
VotingOnExistingHubInstructions: Tap on the hub that you’d like to vote on. A tab will pop open with different options to vote. Tell us whether this location is Lit! Or if it’s not…
TipsGuidelinesList:
To ensure that our information is accurate, you can only vote on hubs within a certain distance from you
If you click on a hub and only the information button appears, this means you have to move closer to the hub in order to vote on it
You only get one vote per hub, but you can change it as many times as you want by reopening the voting tab
Your vote only lasts 2 hours, so make sure to vote again if you’re still there
